questions.text: a) Explain Asymptotic notation and its types 7 b) Write general plan for recursive algorithm. Find time complexity for Tower of Hanoi 10 c) Find time complexity of the given algorithm using step & count method int maximum(int a[],int n) { Max=a[0]; for(i=1;i<n;i++) 8 { If(a[i]>max) { Max=a[i]; } } Return max; } OR

a) Outline an algorithm to find maximum of n elements and obtain its time complexity 8 b) List and explain different problem techniques 7 c) Give the general plan for analyzing time efficiency of non-recursive algorithms . a) Explain divide and conquer technique with neat diagram. 1/2 n2(n-1) and n3 2) n! and 2n Page 1 of 3 c) Compute strassen's matrix multiplication for the following matrix and give recurrence 10 relation 2 0 1 1 1 0 0 1 A = 0 1 4 1 B = 2 0 1 4 1 3 0 0 0 1 1 2 5 2 1 0 5 3 1 0 UNIT – III

a) Write an algorithm for job sequencing with deadline.
